titles.title: Protecting Sibling Relationships in Foster Care Act
Protecting Sibling Relationships in Foster Care Act
To encourage the development of specialized foster care programs designed specifically for large sibling groups, sibling groups with a wide age range, and sibling groups with complex needs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Protecting Sibling Relationships in Foster Care Act
This bill requires the Administration for Children and Families to establish a competitive pilot grant program for foster care agencies to increase the placement of siblings together in foster care.
